jobs.title: UI Tech Lead at Fidelity
jobs.bodyHTML: Angular and Node development for Fidelity Estate Planner application.

jobs.title: Senior Application Developer (Frontend)
jobs.bodyHTML:
- developing new systems AngularJS
- new features and maintaining existing BackboneJS projects
- new features and maintaining existing JQuery/RequireJS single page apps
- continuous integration using Grunt and Jenkins
- deployment with docker and vagrant
- testing with mocha, selenium
- process improvement including agile methodologies

jobs.title: Development Manager, Senior UI Engineer
jobs.bodyHTML:
Employed as Senior UI Engineer the promoted to Development Manager.

Lead team of developers building Astonish's next generation SaaS platform. Also lead developer on the front team, heavily involved in UX and product specifications.

Key Achievements:
- Recruitment of Javascript and Java engineers, grew team.
- Helped implement Agile methodologies getting team to deliver predictably.
- Mentored developers in coding and interpersonal communication.

Key Projects:
Astonish Beta:
- Fully decoupled UI communicates using REST, JSON.
- Shared validation model between Java backend and AngularJS
- Lead development of front end framework initially in Backbone js then in Angular
- Managing team of developers towards delivering software in very tight timeframe.
- D3.js dashboard
- Project estimation, planning, scheduling.

VPC 2x Reporting
- build from scratch D3.js based reporting system including visualizing customer acquisition
- REST/JSON architecture

Key Technologies: Javascript, Angular, Backbone, D3 Visualisation Library, Jasmine unit testing, Grunt, Bash Scripting, Python, ASP.net, Backbone, apache, nginx

jobs.title: Designer/Developer
jobs.bodyHTML: Contract work in UK on various it projects, primarily as a front end web developer and UI/UX consultant. Also Drupal customization and module development including responsive design to support mobile.

jobs.title: Web Developer
jobs.bodyHTML: Contract work in UK on various it projects, primarily as a front end web developer. Also helping out with art projects.

jobs.title: Websites Manager (started as Contract Developer)
jobs.bodyHTML:
I started with the Department of Corrections as a contract developer doing MySource Matrix and web design consultancy. After six months I was asked to take over Websites Manager position when the previous manager left.

Key Duties
- managing web team
- recruiting contractors
- interfacing with and managing work by the four key vendors
- managing web projects for all departments
- advising other teams within the department on internet/intranet strategy
- forming community of practice

Key Projects:
- Lead the redesign and re-architecture of the intranet
- selection and engagement of Graphic Design and Information Architecture agency
- coordinating this work across all parts of one of New Zealand's largest government departments
- coordinating web 20 web editors from various teams
- prison services manual rewrite and new functionality

Key Technologies: MySource Matrix CMS, Javascript, HTML, Bash Scripting, Python, jQuery

jobs.title: Designer/Developer
jobs.bodyHTML: Graphic design for the kete project http://kete.net.nz. Ruby on rails development, front end development, e-government compliance and graphic design.

jobs.title: Designer/Developer/Implementor
jobs.bodyHTML:
Responsibilities:
- Web standards compliant implementations using MySource Matrix
- Technical sales
- Presenting at conferences
- Delivering Training

Key Projects:
- Department of Corrections Implementation (e-government compliant)
- NIWA site rebuild and migration
- worked closely with Royal New Zealand foundation for the blind to develop techniques for delivering dynamic content to screen reader users.

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.bodyHTML: Sole developer in a four person web team, created Origin CMS and simple extensible content management system with a strong focus on ease of use. Action scripting and various other front end web development projects.

jobs.title: Contract Developer/Designer
jobs.bodyHTML: Contractor developing flash games and low bandwidth dynamic banner ads using Actionscript, writing requirements specifications, and general design work.

jobs.title: Lead Developer
jobs.bodyHTML: Complete rewrite of Jericho's flagship product SmartMail. I was responsible for most of the system design and development. Successfully launched in under 6 months.

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.bodyHTML: Writing Visual Basic applications, database maintenance, report writing, Unix-windows integration and maintenance of a large Informix 4gl payroll system. Setting up Redhat Linux firewall and database server.

jobs.title: Stock Reconciliation Temp
jobs.bodyHTML: At Bank of Scotland and Midlands Bank reconciling share accounts with registrars working to tight deadlines with a high level of accuracy as much of my work resulted in large transfers of stock (winter job - spent summers backpacking in Europe).

education.bodyHTML: A+ for final project, 1st Prize TUANZ student award for final project
